hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Center Skulltula Ches: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #the Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: I wanna be a rocketship, @! Please help me live my dreams!

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Ice Arrows#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: Boing-oing!^There are times in life when one should seek the help of others...^Thus, when standing alone fails to help, stand together.
